The `CodeAdapter` class uses a regular expression to search for evidence in source files. This could lead to issues if the regex pattern is changed or updated without updating other parts of the codebase that rely on this regex.

The `CodeAdapter` class also attempts to perform AST inspection for Python files. This could lead to issues if the AST parsing logic is changed or updated without updating other parts of the codebase that rely on this AST inspection.
